languages.text: "Надеюсь, когда она убивала своего наставника, она хотя бы получила удовольствие. Это ведь такой волнительный момент!"
"One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, когда она убивала своего наставника, она хотя бы получила удовольствие. Это ведь такой волнительный момент!"

traits.locale_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"
"One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

"One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"
"One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

languages.text: "Man kann nur hoffen, dass sie zumindest ein wenig Freude daran hatte, ihren Mentor zu töten. Ein solch berauschender Augenblick muss ausgekostet werden!"
languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

traits.locale_text: "Man kann nur hoffen, dass sie zumindest ein wenig Freude daran hatte, ihren Mentor zu töten. Ein solch berauschender Augenblick muss ausgekostet werden!"

languages.text: « Reste à espérer qu'elle ait au moins pris plaisir à tuer son maître. Une sensation aussi grisante mérite qu'on la savoure pleinement ! »
languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

traits.locale_text: « Reste à espérer qu'elle ait au moins pris plaisir à tuer son maître. Une sensation aussi grisante mérite qu'on la savoure pleinement ! »

languages.text: «Solo puedo esperar que haya disfrutado matando a su mentor. ¡Un momento tan emocionante como ese hay que saborearlo!».
languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

traits.locale_text: «Solo puedo esperar que haya disfrutado matando a su mentor. ¡Un momento tan emocionante como ese hay que saborearlo!».

languages.text: 「彼女が師匠を殺すことに少なくとも喜びを感じていたのだと、願うしかない。そのような爽快な瞬間は楽しまなければ！」
languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼女が師匠を殺すことに少なくとも喜びを感じていたのだと、願うしかない。そのような爽快な瞬間は楽しまなければ！」

languages.text: “我只希望她在杀死她的导师时享受到了乐趣。像这种令人振奋的时刻，确实值得细细品味！”
languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

traits.locale_text: “我只希望她在杀死她的导师时享受到了乐趣。像这种令人振奋的时刻，确实值得细细品味！”

languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"

languages.text: "İster istemez yönderini öldürmekten biraz da olsa zevk aldığını umuyorum. Böylesine baş döndürücü bir anın tadını çıkarmak gerek!"
languages.original_text: "One can only hope that she took at least some pleasure in killing her mentor. Such an exhilarating moment deserves to be savoured!"
